item.description:
Please note there is a one-time $5 charge to be a part of the book club.

We have some new books available for sale for only $15 which you can purchase at the meeting.

Spiritual Book Club

Now reading: "Wishes Fulfilled Mastering the Art of Manifesting " by Wayne Dyer  when this book is done, we will read another - title to be determined.

A great book on manifesting what you want out of life and enhancing your spirituality!
You may join in on the book club at any time. It doesn't matter if you missed any meetings.

Book club is from 6:00 pm to 7:15 pm. Please try to arrive by 5:45 pm if you can. Feel free to grab something from the Cafe when you arrive (i.e. cup of coffee or snack) and bring it into the Event Room.-

To join the book club there is a one-time $5 charge.

You may join the book club any time throughout the entire year and attend as many meetings as you like. If you decide after your first meeting the book club is not for you, we will be happy to process you a refund.

Below are the upcoming meeting dates. Please sign up as they are posted on the website each week. The first week of each month we meet on a Tuesday, all other weeks we meet on Mondays.

Tuesday, October 2
Mondays, October 8, 15, 22, 29

Tuesday, November 6
Mondays, November 12, 19, 26

Tuesday, December 4
Mondays, December 10, 17

More About The Book Club...

The purpose of this book club is to read from life-changing books that help to gain insight on ourselves, our relationships and spirituality. These books that have been chosen are designed to give you a new perspective and live a happier more fulfilling life.

Unlike other book clubs, we read the book together, one or more chapters at a time (no need to read ahead of time unless you miss a meeting).  We then share our insights and perspectives on what was read.

You can buy the books on your own or get them out of the library. You can usually find used books in good condition on Amazon, Ebay, Valorebooks.com, etc. You may also order a new one from Tatnuck. I usually have a few for sale at the first meeting at a great price.

We read one book at a time which could take several weeks or months. Once that book is completed, we will move on to the next one from the list below... to be determined soon.
item.how_to_find_us: See description for meeting location and times.
item.name: Book Club - Wishes Fulfilled
